characters.name: 치크

appearance.face: Cute round chick face with small black eyes and orange beak
appearance.body_type: Small fluffy yellow chick body with tiny wings
appearance.distinguishing_feature: SMALL YELLOW CHICK wearing DESERT CAMO MILITARY HELMET, orange beak and orange feet

characters.speaking_visual: BOUNCES up and down, FLAPS tiny wings

scene_setting.location: Open grassy field with blue sky. Supply crate landed nearby with red parachute.

mood_style.genre: Comedic surprise to despair to hope

timeline.speaker: C
timeline.visual_description: A small yellow chick wearing a desert camo military helmet suddenly POPS UP from behind the landed supply crate. The chick BOUNCES and TILTS its head curiously, FLAPPING tiny wings. The Gamer stands nearby, FROZEN in shock, MOUTH SHUT.

timeline.speaker: A
timeline.camera: Medium shot on Gamer's shocked face
timeline.visual_description: The young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET stares in disbelief at the chick. His MOUTH OPENS WIDE as he SHOUTS in frustration. His arms gesture wildly at the chick. The small yellow chick with military helmet stands STILL, looking up at him innocently.

timeline.speaker: A
timeline.visual_description: The young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET drops to his knees in despair. His MOUTH MOVES as he speaks with utter defeat. His face shows hopelessness. The chick watches from the side, STILL.

timeline.speaker: C
timeline.visual_description: The small yellow chick with desert camo military helmet BOUNCES energetically and FLAPS its tiny wings with determination. It puffs up its chest confidently. The Gamer watches with MOUTH SHUT, confused but hopeful.

scene_setting.location: Dark warehouse interior with metal shelves, wooden crates, dim lighting. Enemies lurking.

mood_style.genre: Action comedy to heroic moment to heartfelt

audio.background: Intense action music transitioning to heartfelt
audio.fx: Gunfire, chick chirps, grenade explosion, frying pan clang

timeline.speaker: C
timeline.visual_description: Inside a dark warehouse, the small yellow chick with desert camo military helmet moves like a trained soldier. It DASHES between cover, JUMPS over obstacles, and takes down enemies with surprising skill. The chick BOUNCES rapidly as it chirps battle cries.

timeline.speaker: A
timeline.visual_description: The young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET watches in complete amazement. His jaw drops, MOUTH OPEN as he speaks with disbelief. His eyes follow the chick's incredible movements. The chick continues fighting in the background, STILL for this shot.

timeline.speaker: A
timeline.visual_description: A grenade flies through the air toward them. The young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET spots it, eyes wide with terror. His MOUTH OPENS as he SCREAMS a warning. The chick looks at the incoming threat, STILL.

timeline.speaker: None
timeline.visual_description: The young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET pulls out a frying pan and SWINGS it at the grenade, deflecting it away in a heroic slow-motion moment. His face shows intense concentration, MOUTH SHUT. The grenade explodes harmlessly in the distance. Smoke billows. Both characters emerge unharmed as smoke clears.

timeline.speaker: C
timeline.camera: Two shot of Cheek and Gamer
timeline.visual_description: The smoke clears revealing both safe. The small yellow chick with desert camo military helmet looks up at the Gamer with gratitude. It BOUNCES happily and FLAPS wings joyfully. The Gamer watches with MOUTH SHUT, touched by the moment.

scene_setting.location: Warehouse interior with golden light streaming in, then transition to clean CTA background.
scene_setting.lighting: Golden hour light transitioning to bright CTA lighting.

mood_style.color_tone: Warm golden transitioning to bright hopeful

timeline.speaker: A
timeline.visual_description: The young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET looks touched but uncertain. His MOUTH OPENS as he speaks with hesitation, rubbing the back of his head nervously. The chick watches him attentively, STILL.

timeline.speaker: C
timeline.visual_description: The small yellow chick with desert camo military helmet holds up a smartphone in its tiny wing. The screen shows a PWS registration form. The chick BOUNCES encouragingly. The Gamer looks at the phone with MOUTH SHUT, surprised and hopeful.

timeline.speaker: None

timeline.visual_description: The young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET and the small yellow chick with military helmet stand together facing the camera.
